SEARCH
Package com.project.RabbitRun.ui

Class UI

java.lang.Object
com.project.RabbitRun.ui.UI
public class UI extends Object
The UI class is responsible for rendering all the user interface components in the RabbitRun game. It includes the main menu, play state, pause state, win, and lose screens, as well as the points and messages display.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UI(GamePanel gamePanel)
    Constructs the UI, initializing fonts and loading images for the menu, win, and lose screens.

      public int getScreenCentreX(String s, Graphics g2)
      Calculates the x-coordinate to center a given string horizontally on the screen.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to center.
      g2 - The Graphics object used for calculating string width.
      Returns:
      The x-coordinate to center the string.
